alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:58PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Nassau, northern Clay and western Duval Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 157 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of St. George to Macclenny to 7 miles east of Raiford. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Orange Park, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Middleburg, Maxville, Fleming Island, Cisco Gardens, Ortega and Oakleaf Plantation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval
